question: When is the CMU Venture Challenge?
answer: The CMU Venture Challenge occurs annually in the spring. The CMU VC 2021 is occuring on April 3, 2021.

question: Who can apply to the CMU Venture Challenge?
answer: Anyone who is a current undergraduate can apply to participate in the startup pitch. Teams with the main founders as current undergraduate students can apply as long as the individuals pitching are also undergraduates. Please refer to the eligibility section on the details page for more information.

question: Where does the CMU Venture Challenge take place?
answer: The CMU VC will occur virtually this school year. All applications, rounds, events, etc. will happen using a remote platform.

question: How much travel reimbursement will my team receive?
answer: For all questions related to travel reimbursement, please refer to the travel reimbursement policy located on our details page.

question: What are the prizes offered?
answer: Please refer to the prizes section for the latest updates on prizes offered located on our details page.

question: What do I need to submit for the application?
answer: Please refer to the application deliverables section for the latest updates on deliverables necessary to submit located on our details page.

question: When will applications open for CMU VC 2021?
answer: Applications will open on December 1, 2020 for CMU VC 2021. Please head over to our apply page for more information.

question: How many teams will make it to the final round of the CMU Venture Challenge?
answer: 12 teams are chosen for the final round demo day.

question: I would like to sponsor / judge / speak at the CMU Venture Challenge. What are the next steps?
answer: That's great to hear! Please contact us by heading over to our contact page and reach out to one of our directors for more information. We will gladly set up a meeting to discuss how we can work together to make our event as best as possible.
